rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Return up to one target colorless permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
Coalesce {4}{G} [i](You may cast this for {4}{G} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Eldrazi Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
